text: Crimson Wetlands is the must-visit spot in Bird Paradise, no joke! The whole place got this super chill, dreamy vibe, with scarlet ibises flaunting their bright red feathers. Seriously, macam straight out of a painting. Walking through, you feel like kena transported to some hidden paradise: quiet, peaceful, but still full of life. Confirm worth your time, don’t miss this one when you go!
The smell transports you to the wetlands and it’s so cute to see the birds roaming free. Love the macaw feeding session and the sleeping ducks. Oh yes and the tiny little ducklings.

Crimson Wetlands in Bird Paradise is absolutely stunning! The vibrant setting, filled with colorful flamingos, scarlet ibises, and roseate spoonbills, feels like stepping into a safari. The wetland habitat is beautifully designed, allowing the birds to roam freely while visitors enjoy up-close views of these amazing creatures. The paths are well laid out, and there are plenty of great photo spots. It’s a peaceful, mesmerizing experience that’s perfect for all ages. A must-visit for nature and bird enthusiasts!
This place has an amazing waterfall and a lot of Flamingos and Parrots that are not in cages.
Beautiful crimson and a man made waterfall.
